attributes.action: To make a change in Syrian children's lives so they have a safe and secure life.
attributes.additional_details: A day out on the beach turned out to be a 5 year olds nightmare as his whole family was killed. Children live in fear everyday which isn't what we want. Imagine being scared everyday as you think that your life may be taken. We need to stand up and speak up about innocent orphan Syrian children being left alone to suffer. This could help Syrian children and we want you to help.
attributes.background: I am passionate about helping the innocent children in Syria as they are either killed or orphans. Most people do not know the outrageous situations innocent children have to face. We need to act now.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help Syrian children.
